Description.Text:
Position Excellent position situated on the sea front of Pesaro close to the town centre.
Restaurant Restaurant with sea view.
More Informations Last refurbishment took place in 2005.
At meal choice of 3 menus accompanied by a mixed buffet and followed by fruit or dessert. Sweet and salty buffet breakfast.
ALL INCLUSIVE HB OR FB TREATMENT, includes: drinks at meals ( 1/2 l. of mineral water + 1/4 l. of wine)+ beach service with 1 sun-umbrella and 2 sun-beds per room for weekly stays with supplement to pay on spot.(for the single rooms no beach service).
ARRIVAL & DEPARTURE: Check in from 01:00 pm - Check out at 10:00 am.
